prompts: Create a majestic dragon Pokemon with shimmering white scales and fiery blue flames in its tail.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that embodies both fire and ice elements, soaring through the sky.
I want a mythical creature with elegant wings and a powerful presence, symbolizing truth and harmony.
Generate a Pokemon design featuring a striking fusion of white and blue colors with ethereal wings.
Show me a Reshiram-inspired Pokemon that has a regal appearance and a fiery determination in battle.
Make a unique dragon Pokemon that emits a soft glow with hints of orange accents along its body.
Design a Pokemon that represents the balance of fire and truth, with intricate features and a strong aura.
